thread.section_title: Vermont Farm Table Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Vermont Farm Table | vermontfarmtable.com
thread.title: Michael Wood-Lewis, FrontPorchForum.com
thread.title_full: Vermont Farm Table reviewed by Michael Wood-Lewis, FrontPorchForum.com

author: Michael Wood-Lewis, FrontPorchForum.com
title: Michael Wood-Lewis, FrontPorchForum.com
text: Wow... our new 6-foot walnut table from Vermont Farm Table is gorgeous... and solid. It's the centerpiece of our meeting space... a perfect fit for our needs. Glad to work with folks at the local storefront in Burlington... it even arrived a day early. Thanks VFT.
